title: Start
body:
<<layerSet Dialogue 2>>
<<outfit Aig Casual>>
<<outfit J-Pe Casual>>
<<expression Aig NNNF>>
<<flip Kent>>
<<move Aig StageRight2>><<move Kent StageLeft2>>
<<name Friendship Kent>>
<<expression Kent NNNF>>
Aig.
<<flip Aig>>
<<name Friendship Aig>>
<<expression Aig RLWF>>
Miss Kent! I didn't hear you come in.
<<name Friendship Kent>>
Have you looked at a phone recently?
<<name Friendship Aig>>
<<expression Aig NNNF>>
Um...not really.  Why?
<<name Friendship Kent>>
<<expression Kent NSNF>>
You're blowing up on social media.
<<expression Kent NNNB>>
So to speak.
<<name Friendship Aig>>
<<expression Kent NNNF>>
<<expression Aig RLWF>>
Really?
<<move Aig StageLeft1>>
Let me see!
<<name Friendship Kent>>
<<expression Aig NSNF>>
Here.
<<name Friendship Aig>>
...
<<expression Aig NLNF>>
Wow! I've never seen so many followers on my page!
<<expression Aig NNNF>>
Or so many memes.
<<move Aig CenterStage>>
<<expression Aig NONF>>
Miss Kent, am I a meme?
<<name Friendship Kent>>
<<expression Kent NSNF>>
Memes are good, Aig.  We can work with memes.
<<name Friendship Aig>>
<<expression Aig NLNF>>
Nice!
<<name Friendship J-Pe>>
Memes?!
<<move J-Pe StageRight2>>
<<flip Aig>>
<<expression Aig NNNF>>
<<expression Kent NNNF>>
<<expression J-Pe RHNF>>
Did somebody say my name?
<<name Friendship Aig>>
<<expression Aig NSNF>>
Oh hey, J-Pe! 
<<expression Aig NLNF>>
I'm blowing up on social media!
<<name Friendship Kent>>
<<expression Kent NNNB>>
So to speak.
<<name Friendship J-Pe>>
<<expression Kent NNNF>>
<<expression J-Pe ANSF>>
<<expression Aig NSNF>>
Wait, what?! 
<<move J-Pe StageLeft1>>
<<move Aig StageRight1>>
<<flip Aig>>
<<expression Aig NNNF>>
Lemme see that phone!
...

title: Good
body:
<<expression J-Pe AOSF>>
A hundred followers?!
<<name Friendship Aig>>
<<expression Aig RLWF>>
I know right!
<<expression Aig NLNF>>
How crazy is that!
<<flip J-Pe>>
<<name Friendship J-Pe>>
How the hell did you get a hundred followers in three weeks?
->Hard work.
    <<name Friendship Aig>>
    <<expression Aig NSNF>>
    I mean, I've been passing out a ton of fliers lately.
    <<expression Aig NLNF>>
    I guess I've been making a good impression out there!
    <<name Friendship J-Pe>>
    <<expression J-Pe ANSB>>
    *sigh*
    Well, that's great and all, but...
    <<expression J-Pe ANNF>>
    Are you sure that's such a good idea?
    <<name Friendship Aig>>
    <<expression Aig NONF>>
    What do you mean?
    <<name friendship J-Pe>>
    <<move J-Pe StageRight2>>
    <<move Aig CenterStage>>
    I mean... the debut's only a week away.
    <<flip J-Pe>>
    <<flip Aig>>
    Shouldn't you focus more on your vocals and choreography?
    You know, the stuff that'll actually matter at the concert?
    ->I guess you're right.
        <<name Friendship Aig>>
        <<expression Aig NNNB>>
        I... I guess so.
        <<expression Aig NNNF>>
        I suppose I should be getting ready for the performance.
        <<name Friendship J-Pe>>
        <<statUp Friendship J-Pe>>
        <<expression J-Pe RSNF>>
        Exactly!
        <<expression J-Pe NHNF>>
        Trust me, Aiggy, I know what I'm talking about when it comes to this stuff.
        <<name Friendship Aig>>
        <<expression Aig NNNB>>
        Yeah... yeah, okay.
        <<name Friendship J-Pe>>
        <<expression J-Pe NLNF>>
        Awesomesauce.
        <<expression J-Pe NHNF>>
        Now, if you'll excuse me, I've got to see a man about snakeskin undershirts.
        <<flip J-Pe>>
        <<expression J-Pe NLNF>>
        Ciao, bitches!
        <<move J-Pe OffStageRight>>
        <<name Friendship Aig>>
        <<expression Aig NONF>>
        That was...weird.
        <<flip Aig>>
        <<expression Aig NNNF>>
        What was that all about?
    ->I do what I want.
        <<name Friendship Aig>>
        <<expression Aig ANSF>>
        No way! I like doing PR! AND I'm good at it!
        Why should I stop now?
        <<name Friendship J-Pe>>
        <<expression J-Pe ANSF>>
        <<statDown Friendship J-Pe>>
        *tch*
        <<expression J-Pe AOWF>>
        Fine! Do what you want!
        <<expression J-Pe ANSF>>
        But if you ruin this debut for me, I will LITERALLY murder you.
        I know where you sleep, Aigburth.
        <<flip J-Pe>>
        <<expression J-Pe ANNU>>
        Ugh!
        <<move J-Pe OffStageRight>>
        <<name Friendship Aig>>
        <<expression Aig NNNF>>
        Man.
        <<flip Aig>>
        What's his deal?
->Dumb luck.
    <<name Friendship Aig>>
    <<expression Aig NSNF>>
    Just lucky I guess.
    <<name Friendship J-Pe>>
    <<expression J-Pe AOSF>>
    <<statDown Friendship J-Pe>>
    JUST LUCKY!?
    <<expression J-Pe ANSF>>
    What do you mean "just lucky?!"
    <<name Friendship Aig>>
    <<expression Aig NONB>>
    I don't know.  I mean, I wasn't really TRYING to get more followers...
    <<expression Aig NONF>>
    It just kinda happened.
    <<name Friendship J-Pe>>
    <<expression J-Pe AOSF>>
    JUST KINDA HAPPENED?!
    <<move J-Pe StageRight2>>
    <<flip Aig>>
    <<expression J-Pe ANNF>>
    UGH.
    Don't talk to me rn.
    <<name Friendship Aig>>
    <<expression Aig NNNF>>
    J-Pe...
    <<flip J-Pe>>
    <<name Friendship J-Pe>>
    I SAID don't talk to me rn.
    <<expression ANSF>>
    That means RN!
    <<flip J-Pe>>
    <<move J-Pe OffStageRight>>
    <<name Friendship Aig>>
    <<expression Aig NONF>>
    Uhhhh...
    <<flip Aig>>
    What's up with him?
<<name Friendship Kent>>
Well obviously he's jealous of you.
<<expression Aig ROWF>>
<<name Friendship Aig>>
Jealous?
<<name Friendship Kent>>
<<expression Kent NNNF>>
And let me tell you, Aig, the tension between you guys... you could cut it with a knife...
<<expression Kent ASWF>>
...and then spread it all over some fancy crackers and eat it with a fine red wine. 
<<expression Kent NSNF>>
Delicious.
<<name Friendship Aig>>
<<expression Aig NNNF>>
Why would he be jealous of-
<<expression Aig ROWF>>
Wait... what?
<<name Friendship Kent>>
Aaaaand posted.
<<name Friendship Aig>>
<<expression Aig NNNF>>
...
<<expression Aig ROWF>>
Hold on! We're you filming on your phone this whole time?!
<<name Friendship Kent>>
You thought you had followers before, wait 'till they get a load of this dram bomb.
Good work, Aig.  Keep it up.
<<flip Kent>>
<<move Kent OffStageLeft>>
<<name Friendship Aig>>
<<expression Aig RONF>>
Wait, but...
<<flip Aig>>
<<expression Aig NNNF>>
...what?

title: Bad
body:
<<expression J-Pe NNNF>>
Wow.
<<name Friendship Aig>>
<<expression Aig NLNF>>
I know, right?! I'm really blowing up!
<<name Friendship Kent>>
<<expression Kent NNNB>>
*ahem*
<<expression Kent NNNF>>
So to speak.
<<name Friendship Aig>>
I mean, six whole followers?
That's more than double what I had three weeks ago!
<<name Friendship J-Pe>>
<<expression J-Pe NSNF>>
<<move J-Pe StageRight2>>
<<flip Aig>>
<<flip J-Pe>>
You know what? That's great, little buddy! 
<<flip J-Pe>>
Way to go.
<<name Friendship Aig>>
Hey, thanks!
<<flip Aig>>
<<move Aig StageLeft1>>
Look, check it out! I've got Lee, and Miss Kent, and the academy, and...
<<expression Aig NNNF>>
...
<<flip Aig>>
<<expression Aig NONF>>
I don't see you here, J-Pe.
<<name Friendship J-Pe>>
<<expression J-Pe NSWB>>
Whhhhhhhaaaaaaaat...are you talking about?
<<name Friendship Aig>>
You don't follow me on the Internet?
<<name Friendship J-Pe>>
<<expression J-Pe NHWF>>
No, what? I totally follow you!
->You're lying.
    <<expression Aig ANSF>>
    <<name Friendship Aig>>
    Dude, I can see all six of my followers right here.  You're not here.
    <<name Friendship J-Pe>>
    <<expression J-Pe NNNF>>
    I, uh...
    ...
    <<statDown Friendship J-Pe>>
    <<expression J-Pe ANSF>>
    Alright, fine! I don't follow you.
    <<flip J-Pe>>
    I mean, whatever! It's bad for my image to be following somebody who only has six followers anyway.
    <<name Friendship Kent>>
    <<expression Kent NNWB>>
    Technically, he's not wrong.
    <<name Friendship J-Pe>>
    <<expression Kent NNNF>>
    <<flip J-Pe>>
    Come talk to me when you've got a REAL following, Aigburth.
    <<flip J-Pe>>
    Later!
    <<move J-Pe OffStageRight>>
    <<name Friendship Aig>>
    <<move Aig StageRight1>>
    Jerk!
    <<name Friendship Kent>>
    He's right you know, it's not a good look.
    <<flip Aig>>
    <<expression Aig NNNF>>
    <<expression Kent AHNF>>
    Getting to six followers should NOT be a three hundred percent improvement.
    Rookie numbers, Aig. Work on it.
    <<flip Kent>>
    <<move Kent OffStageLeft>>
    <<name Friendship Aig>>
    <<expresion Aig NONF>>
    But I--
    ...
    <<expression Aig NNNB>>
    ...man.
->Must have missed you.
    <<name Friendship Aig>>
    <<expression Aig NNNF>>
    Well, I don't see you here.
    Must be a glitch or something.
    <<expression J-Pe NHNF>>
    <<name Friendship J-Pe>>
    Yeah! A glitch! I mean, you know the Internet... always glitching out, like, all the time.
    <<expression J-Pe NHNB>>
    Hey, you know what, I just remembered that I left the oven on... fire.
    <<expression J-Pe NHNF>>
    I'll be right back!
    <<move J-Pe OffStageRight>>
    <<flip Aig>>
    <<name Friendship Aig>>
    <<expression Aig NSNF>>
    Wow, six followers! You could round that up to ten, and that's double digits.
    <<name Friendship ...>>
    <<expression Aig NNNF>>
    *ba-DING*
    <<name Friendship Aig>>
    <<expression Aig RLWF>>
    HOLY CRAP,LOOK! I just got another one. That's SEVEN!
    <<move J-Pe StageRight2>>
    <<expression J-Pe NSNF>>
    <<name Friendship J-Pe>>
    What did I miss?
    <<flip Aig>>
    <<name Friendship Aig>>
    <<expression Aig NLNF>>
    I just got another follower!
    <<flip Aig>>
    And look, check it out! You're on my follower list now too!
    <<flip Aig>>
    They must have fixed that glitch!
    <<name Friendship J-Pe>>
    <<expression J-Pe NHNB>>
    Oh, would you look at that! That's great!
    <<statUp Friendship J-Pe>>
    <<expression J-Pe NSNF>>
    I'm proud of you, champ.
    <<name Friendship Aig>>
    Thanks, man!
    <<name Friendship Kent>>
    <<expression Kent RHWU>>
    Dear god.
    <<flip Aig>>
    <<move Aig CenterStage>>
    <<expression Aig NNNF>>
    What is it, Miss Kent.
    <<name Friendship J-Pe>>
    <<expression J-Pe ANSF>>
    <<expression Kent NHNF>>
    Yeah. What is it Miss Kent.
    <<name Friendship Kent>>
    *sigh*
    <<expression Kent NNNF>>
    Nothing.  I don't have time for this.
    <<flip Kent>>
    Get back to work, both of you.
    <<move Kent OffStageLeft>>
    <<name Friendship J-Pe>>
    <<expression J-Pe NSNF>>
    What a weirdo, amirite?
    <<flip Aig>>
    <<name Friendship Aig>>
    <<expression Aig NLNF>>
    Haha! Yeah, totally!
